name: Horse Jump
description:
JUMP the barriers and the holes in the bridge! Collect hay to feed the horse!

- Help the horse escape the obstacles and the holes in the bridge!
- Collect hay to feed the horse!
- The game will be different every time you play!
- There are 15 types of paths, 16 types of barriers, 10 differents positions of hay, all of them randomly matching throughout the game!
- Live and colorful HD graphics!
- Get Horseshoe to have super jumps!
- Challenge and help your friends!

Join this most electrifying race!

Worldwide distribution application with 100% optimized graphics!

Dear Customers, iOS 10.3.2 version is causing conflicts in the Horse Jump game. We're Compatibilizing the game for the latest version of Apple's Operating System. We will be updating the game as soon as possible. Thank you for understanding us.
